JS Functions: Arguments
[Source: code with mosh/basics/functions/arguments.md]
What is the `arguments` object in a function?
column2: It is an array-like object accessible inside functions that contains the values of the arguments passed to that function.

column2: `call` takes arguments separately, while `apply` takes arguments as an array.

}

JS OOP: Private Members

constructor(r) {
_radius.set(this, r);
}
